isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - SPRING BRAKE CONTROL VALVE (MIDLAND ROSS) - REASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: REASSEMBLE
svcproc.para: Use new parts supplied in repair kit.

Lubricate O-rings, O-ring sealing surfaces and all internal parts. Refer to Item 3 of
LUBRICANT SPECIFICATIONS
.
Refer to Figure 37 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install O-ring (Item 7) on piston (Item 2) and insert piston into body (Item 4), aligning hex on piston to hex on body.
Position valve assembly (Item 9) over end of piston (Item 2), then position washer (Item 15) over piston stud end against metal face of valve.
Install nut and tighten to 10 ft-lbs.
(14 N• m). Piston should move smoothly back and forth in body.
Install spring (Item 13) with small end against valve disc.
Position O-ring (Item 11) over end cap (Item 1). Align end cap over spring and push end cap into body. Hold end cap to prevent spring pushing end cap out.
Install snap ring (Item 12) in valve body groove.

svcproc.para: When applying force to move plunger in and releasing it, plunger should move freely.

step1.para: Install new O-rings on stem and piston (Item 2).
Insert stem in valve body; then position piston in valve body over stem.
Install valve end cap (Item 1) and new gasket.
